Name: Movie Studio 18 Steam Edition
About the game: Sharing your gaming experience, E-sports challenges or Letâ€™s play videos on all the platforms has never been so fast and easy. Movie Studio has a powerful video engine for faster-rendering speed. Explore the large toolbox full of innovative features for transitions, effects, titles, sound design, graphics, animations, and so much more. A POWERHOUSE FOR YOUR CREATIVITY INFUSION Engine 2 The engine that powers Movie Studio builds on native hardware support for graphics cards by Intel, NVIDIA and AMD. The result is instant and seamless previews without the need for proxy files or time-consuming rendering. YOUR PERSONAL CREATIVE TOOLBOX Your fully customizable workspace adapts to your preferences and gives you everything you need at a glance - making the most of your screen setup. Effortlessly explore a large toolbox full of innovative features for transitions, effects, titles, sound design, graphics, animations, and so much more. Adjust colour, stabilize shaky images or apply layer masks with simple yet effective options - including an impressive wizard for whenever you need perfect results in a blink of an eye. Only available in English (please note that if you already own Video Deluxe this product is similar) HIGHLIGHTS Up to 900 effects, titles, templates & transitions* Easy colour correction Professional image stabilization Burn DVDs & Blu-ray discs INFUSION Engine 2 for unparalleled performance Edit and export 8K Ultra HD Video *Many of these effects and templates are paid add-ons which must be bought in the store.
